title-group.article-title: Lexical Description for NLP: The Case of the French Adverb "Presque"

abstract.p: This paper presents a detailed linguistic (syntactic, semantic and pragmatic) analysis of the French scalar adverb "presque"; the analysis is performed so as to be computationally relevant. Further, a methodology for describing other closed-class lexical items is suggested. Such descriptions are necessary for the support of natural language processing systems including analyzers, generators and machine translation systems.
